name: Mad Adventure
description:
Do you remember times playing TOUGH pixel games and how it made you CRAZY?
Mad Adventure will make you remember that bright and brilliant moments!!!

10 engaging and unimitable levels, which are gonna test your skills for strength.

-CARTOON graphics
-SMOOTH animation
-SILLY enemies
-ATTRACTIVE and FASCINATING 8 bit music

*Collect all stars
*Kill all enemies
*Do not let glitch kill you
*Solve difficult puzzles
*Find the exit of the maze
*Win an enormous and angry BOSS

FANTASTIC PIXEL WORLD NEEDS YOU
